price: (26) And to Him belongs whoever is in the heavens and earth. All are to Him devoutly obedient.
arabic: وَلَهُۥ مَن فِي ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِۖ كُلّٞ لَّهُۥ قَٰنِتُونَ

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: walahu man fī al-samāwāti wal-arḍi kullun lahu qānitūna
